column4: hi i am doing an update and i am asked about samba, it says keep the local version currently installed , etc etc
install the package maintainers version means?
i assume its  best to do  "install the package maintainers version"?
Unless you have edited the samba config manually
i'll have to copy it off
Well i would select the "keep current version"
i am usually a latest version kind of guy
so i have saved the bottom section, iirc that is the only part i need to write back?
should i close all other programs like this one  while updating? (i usually do)
Usaully not much of a problem
